AUTHOR: Kowlin
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing Sentry, Known issues:
The sentry cog doesn't load after using ``reload``
**Temp solution:** Either restart the bot or unload the cog and reload it.
. For support go to the following discord server: https://kowlin.xyz/cogsupport
NAME: Sentry
SHORT: Log your bot errors to Sentry.
DESCRIPTION: Log your bot errors to Sentry. This cog will log all errors that the bot catches on a bot wide level to Sentry. Includes tag support.
